channel.title: Portfolio on Andres Imlauer
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Andres Imlauer

item.title: Arduino Temperature Sensor
item.description: Capture and logging of temperature and humidity sensors using ESP32 in C/C++. We use FireBase as the DB. We also implement reading and executing commands remotely such as turning LEDs on or off, writing to a display and sounding a buzzer from a web client programmed in ReactJS.

item.title: Graph Plotter
item.description: I developed a graph plotter as a final project for a Python course. This program was implemented using the Fruchterman-Reingold algorithm.

item.title: TaTeTi Distributed Server
item.description: University Project. TaTeTi distributed server programmed in Erlang.

item.title: Typing Test
item.description: The applicatiton was built with PHP/MySQL, JQuery/Ajax.
